name: Real Riders
description:
The classic is back, stronger than ever! Enjoy the best physics simulation over two wheels and the best graphics.
Real Riders. Completely free without in-app purchases. Beat your friends on the scoreboards.
An indie game that will make you dream with impossible speeds.

"Real Riders App works great, overall great visuals!" by iosappspy.com

"This is a great MTB app. The graphics and dynamics are great, especially the human body, although that makes it painful to watch crashes." on essexhertsmtb.co.uk

"This game is amazing!" by Freed

"Fun for sure. Great app!! Nothing like pulling a manual through a rock garden doing 57mph." by Half

"Slalom course. Doesn't hit brakes. Doing 70 mph... Looks like 200. Wrecks and goes through a ramp. 21/10 would go sonic speed again." by TheThrasher900

"This game is awesome. Lots of fun and the graphics are amazing. Best free game I've seen in a long time..." by Projectnwork

This game doesn't include in-app purchases. No internet connection needed to play.

Join the comunity!
https://www.facebook.com/tactilarts/
